topic.title: New year celebration
topic.body: At 00:00 by MSK was celebration words by President Putin. Almost in 12 hrs it gather 10k likes and 80k dislikes. And gathered thousands negative comments. But after author of that channel close comments and like|/dislike statistics...

1546255047_17mM4YqSx7nMkYcePZB2GWcJBzkog.body:
A) can see sites, no topics
B) can see sites, but can see topic via proxy
